SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM lc_vw_rotinaseparacao WHERE cd_unid_de_neg BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' ORDER BY espera DESC

SELECT rtrim(COALESCE( ( SELECT DISTINCT CHAR(39) + RTRIM(a.cd_pedido) + CHAR(39) + ',' FROM FAPEDIDO a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN and_impressao_romaneio WITH(NOLOCK) ON and_impressao_romaneio.cd_pedido = ':1' INNER JOIN FAIMXDOC ON FAIMXDOC.Un_negocio = a.Cd_unid_de_neg AND FAIMXDOC.Tipo = 'N' AND a.cd_cliente = ':2' WHERE Controle = '31' AND a.Cd_cliente NOT IN('002755') AND a.Campo102 <> 'EX' AND a.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':3' AND a.Campo143 = ':4' AND A.Colecao = ':5' AND a.Cd_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT Cd_cliente FROM FAPEDIDO fap WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE fap.Controle BETWEEN '28' AND '28' AND fap.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':3' AND fap.Cd_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT cd_empresa FROM GEUNIDNE ) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM FAITEMPE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ESMATERI WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAITEMPE.Cd_material = ESMATERI.Cd_material WHERE ESMATERI.Cd_grupo IN('PA', 'PR') AND FAITEMPE.cd_pedido = a.cd_pedido ) FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), '')) Pedidos;

SELECT rtrim(COALESCE( ( SELECT DISTINCT CHAR(39) + RTRIM(a.cd_pedido) + CHAR(39) + ',' FROM FAPEDIDO a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN and_impressao_romaneio WITH(NOLOCK) ON and_impressao_romaneio.cd_pedido = ':1' INNER JOIN FAIMXDOC ON FAIMXDOC.Un_negocio = a.Cd_unid_de_neg AND FAIMXDOC.Tipo = 'N' AND a.cd_cliente = ':2' WHERE Controle = '28' AND a.Cd_cliente NOT IN('002755') AND a.Campo102 <> 'EX' AND a.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':3' AND a.Campo143 = ':4' AND A.Colecao = ':5' AND a.Cd_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT Cd_cliente FROM FAPEDIDO fap WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE fap.Controle BETWEEN '12' AND '27' AND fap.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':3' AND fap.Cd_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT cd_empresa FROM GEUNIDNE ) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM FAITEMPE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ESMATERI WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAITEMPE.Cd_material = ESMATERI.Cd_material WHERE ESMATERI.Cd_grupo IN('PA', 'PR') AND FAITEMPE.cd_pedido = a.cd_pedido ) FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), '')) Pedidos;
